competitorComparisons.summary: Skylight is a $299+ wall-mounted touchscreen that displays family calendars and photos. Honeydew is software-based AI that works on every device you already own.
competitorComparisons.verdict: Honeydew for families who want AI automation and flexibility. Skylight for families who want a dedicated kitchen display.

competitorComparisons.summary: Cozi is a traditional family organizer with shared calendar, lists, and meal planner. No AI, no voice, no multi-family. Honeydew automates what Cozi leaves manual.
competitorComparisons.verdict: Honeydew for families who want AI automation. Cozi for families who want simplicity and low cost.

competitorComparisons.summary: TimeTree is a free shared calendar app popular with couples and small families. No lists, no AI, no task management.
competitorComparisons.verdict: Honeydew for full family organization. TimeTree for couples who just need a shared calendar.

competitorComparisons.summary: Google Calendar is free and ubiquitous but not designed for family coordination. No shared lists, no AI agent, no multi-family architecture.
competitorComparisons.verdict: Honeydew for dedicated family organization. Google Calendar as a basic calendar that Honeydew syncs with.

competitorComparisons.summary: OurFamilyWizard is a court-focused co-parenting app at $300/yr. Designed for high-conflict custody situations with expense tracking and communication logging.
competitorComparisons.verdict: Honeydew for cooperative co-parenting + full family org. OurFamilyWizard for high-conflict custody situations requiring court documentation.

competitorComparisons.summary: Todoist is an individual productivity app with powerful task management but no family-specific features, no shared calendar, no AI agent.
competitorComparisons.verdict: Honeydew for family organization. Todoist for individual productivity.

competitorComparisons.summary: Hearth Display is a $500+ wall-mounted family hub with touchscreen. Like Skylight but more expensive with additional smart home features.
competitorComparisons.verdict: Honeydew for AI-powered family organization on any device. Hearth for families who want a premium wall-mounted command center.
